title: Comment from Service Employees International Union

analysis.key_quote: The proposed reclassification of 'policy-influencing' positions into Schedule P/C raises sweeping concerns for our members and the communities that rely on them.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the erosion of civil service protections, due process rights, and the potential for politicization of the federal workforce, which aligns with the indicators of opposition.
